title: Design for Textile: Cutout, Series #640
medium: Cut tissue paper mounted on white tracing paper mounted to cardboard, brush and white and gray gouache, graphite
description: Totemic shapes of cut paper, predominately white and beige tones with small accent color shapes in pink, red, blue and peach.  The cut outs are mounted on two sheets of white and gray painted paper mounted on cardboard
name: Collage
